title: SPARQ Systems Named in TSX Venture 50 List of Top Performing Companies
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - February 19, 2025) - Sparq Systems Inc. (TSXV: SPRQ) (OTCQB: SPRQF) (FSE: M26) ("Sparq" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has been included in the TSX Venture 50 list in the Clean Technology and Renewable Energy sector. title: SPARQ Announces Appointment of Chief Technology Officer and Stock Option Grants
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - July 2, 2024) - SPARQ Systems Inc. (TSXV: SPRQ) (OTCQB: SPRQF) ("SPARQ" or the "Company") is pleased to announce it has appointed Majid Pahlevani as its Chief Technology Officer.
